name: Jingo
description: Worlds first turn-based VR game. Jingo is a game dedicated to the endless possibilities and experiences of virtual reality. This game will offer the player everything that this technology can provide.
minimum_requirements: OS: Window 7 – 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5 – 4590 equivalent Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Window 10 – 64bit Processor: Intel Core i7 – 6800 equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 / Radeon Pro Duo DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
